reviews.reviewText: Good Illustrationen help to understand and imagine much better.
reviews.title: Extremely helpful for Most questions of 3-5 Years

reviews.name: National Geographic Little Kids First Big Book of Why
reviews.reviewText: Lots of great information for my 6 year old son to take in. He enjoys learning about all of the different subjects in the book. I do too! :)
reviews.title: Good info!

reviews.name: National Geographic Little Kids First Big Book of Why
reviews.title: Great book for my daughter

reviews.name: National Geographic Little Kids First Big Book of Why
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for my grandchildren who live in another state. I have not sent it to them yet, but I think they will enjoy all the questions and answers. Well done! Parents, as well as their children, will enjoy reading through this informative hardcover book. National Geographic is a great publishing firm.
reviews.title: Answers to all the children's "Why"questions

reviews.name: National Geographic Little Kids First Big Book of Why
reviews.reviewText: Great book, my 4 year old grandbaby loves the pictures. Lots of questions and great answers. Only one issue, on page 18 there is the question of why does grandma have wrinkles. I have known a few grandmas and a few kids in my day, and never once have I ever heard any child ask that question. Kids usually don't think of stuff like that on their own, they just love you for being you. Why not just talk about the shar-pei (dog) and leave the grandmas out of it?
reviews.title: Review
